title: Episode 25: Yeonmi Park
itunes:title: Episode 25: Yeonmi Park
description: Yeonmi Park, a human right activist, joins Sasha on this week's episode. She details her escape from North Korea at age 13. Yeonmi describes what it was like to build a new life in a western culture, eventually settling in the United States, and how she continues to fight for her people.
author: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee
itunes:author: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee
